pages.text: $(bgreen)Pumpkin$() hasn't heard from his cousin Renfield lately. Apparently Renfield's a big star, some kind of... what was it... sports hero? Peggle Master? Pumpkin doesn't really get it. He just does his job.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)125$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)Outer Layer$() plant that only place on other plants to protect them with a $(bred)400 heart defence$().
